short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assistive extension for people with color vision deficiency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshot the current viewport, a selected area or a specific element on the page and inspect the color shades and approximate color names of the pixels.

Click on the extension icon for different methods of selecting pixels to inspect

✔️ 100% free and open source
✔️ Highly customizable
✔️ All processing is done locally
✔️ Free of tracking, analytics or ads
✔️ Does not break websites

Source and more Information: https://github.com/Mtillmann/color-helper-extension
